data.eml:eml: Review of Goniozus Förster, 1856 (Hymenoptera: Bethylidae) of Korea, with descriptions of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lim, Jongok, Lee, Seunghwan (2012): Review of Goniozus Förster, 1856 (Hymenoptera: Bethylidae) of Korea, with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 3414: 43-57, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210794
